title: 2022 Around the NFC in 48 Minutes
itunes:title: 2022 Around the NFC in 48 Minutes
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler, Gregg Rosenthal and Patrick Claybon go around the entire NFC, division by division, with 3 minutes for each team. We start with the NFC East, followed by the NFC North. Then, we take a halftime break to speak with "Handsome Hank" Henry Hodgson about the newly released NFL International Schedule for 2022. After that, the heroes hit the NFC South, and we close the episode with the NFC West. And it definitely only took 48 minutes!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
